content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 21, "index": 14}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 25, "index": 29}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft brown_wool, I need to first craft brown_dye. To craft brown_dye, I need to place the cocoa_beans in the crafting grid. I will move the cocoa_beans from slot 38 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 21, "index": 14}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 25, "index": 29}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}]
thought: To craft brown_wool, I need to first craft brown_dye. I have now crafted brown_dye, and will move it to a free slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 21, "index": 14}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 25, "index": 29}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}]
thought: To craft brown_wool, I need to place the brown_dye and white_wool in the crafting grid. I will move the brown_dye from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 21, "index": 14}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 25, "index": 29}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}]

Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_wool
inventory=[{"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 21, "index": 14}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 25, "index": 29}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}]
thought: To craft brown_wool, I need to place the brown_dye and white_wool in the crafting grid. I have now crafted brown_wool, and will move it to a free slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
